after moving "DigitalClock5.app" into "/Applications"
run the following command in the Terminal:

xattr -cr "/Applications/DigitalClock5.app/"


Official Homepage:
https://digitalclock4.sourceforge.io

Github:
https://github.com/Kolcha/DigitalClock5

Bug Report:
https://github.com/Kolcha/DigitalClock5/issues
